source: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_SEQ_00<tab>Briardien has seen enough incompetence for the day.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_SEQ_00<tab>ブリアルディアンは、少し焦っているようだ。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_SEQ_01<tab>Frustrated at yet another interruption at the hands of his nemesis Hildibrand, Briardien has resolved to continue the investigation at the Coliseum, where the Mythril Cup melee will soon begin. Return and speak with Dour Meadow.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_SEQ_01<tab>ブリアルディアンによると、もうバトルロイヤルの開始まで時間がないようだ。ウルダハ：ザル回廊のコロセウムにいる「ダワー・メドー」と話そう。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_SEQ_02<tab>The Mythril Cup melee commences! With the other combatants distracted in the heat of battle, Ultros attempts to employ the gold truffles he purchased from Syntgoht to elicit a mighty sneeze from his friend Typhon─the power behind Avila's so-called Tempest Blade. However, the purple fiend only succeeds in getting the fungi roasted to savory perfection by the unwitting Hildibrand. Inspector Briardien swiftly observes the Ala Mhigan gladiatrix's suspicious movements, shortly thereafter revealing Typhon and the conspirators' scheme for all to see. Ultros squirms out of responsibility by assigning all the blame to Avila, successfully convincing Dour Meadow to hold a final event among those who still remain standing in the wake of the storm. Speak with Briardien before departing for the climactic confrontation.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_SEQ_02<tab>アヴィラの剣風の正体は、オルトロスの「先生」である、テュポーンの鼻息だった。最終決戦は仕切り直し、オルトロスとテュポーンと戦うことになった。コロセウムの「ブリアルディアン」と話そう。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_SEQ_03<tab>Less than impressed at the octopus's machinations, Briardien expresses his confidence in your ability to make some sense out of this madness. Make for Halatali and speak with Dour Meadow when you are ready to do battle.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_SEQ_03<tab>ブリアルディアンは、剣風のトリックに驚いているようだ。最終決戦の舞台である、東ザナラーンのハラタリ修練所にいる「ダワー・メドー」と話そう。

source:
TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_SEQ_04The final battle for the Mythril Cup─and the priceless relic sought by the phantom thief─will pit you and seven of your comrades against the dastardly duo of Ultros and Typhon in a special arena known as the Dragon's Neck. Who will remain standing when the storms subside? The challenge awaits!

※The Dragon's Neck can be accessed via the Duty Finder.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_SEQ_04いよいよ最終決戦がはじまる。オルトロスとテュポーンに勝利し、「アマジナ杯闘技会決勝戦」で優勝しよう。

※コンテンツファインダーから攻略に参加できます。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_SEQ_05<tab>You succeed in making seafood soup out of Ultros and his oversized companion. Speak with Inspector Briardien, who will doubtless be pleased with your efforts.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_SEQ_05<tab>無事、オルトロスとテュポーンに勝利をすることができた。ハラタリ修練所前の「ブリアルディアン」と話そう。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_SEQ_06<tab>Briardien praises you for your efforts, which he hopes will serve to keep the priceless relic out of the grasp of the many-faced thief. Return to the Coliseum and speak with Dour Meadow to claim your hard-earned spoils.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_SEQ_06<tab>ブリアルディアンは、冒険者のおかげで優勝賞品を手にすることができると喜んでいた。コロセウムに戻り、「ダワー・メドー」と話そう。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_SEQ_07<tab>No sooner had the award ceremony begun than does the phantom thief make his grand entrance. Hildibrand confronts him, only to find his path obstructed by a spear cast by Gilgamesh, who has returned to avenge the defeat he suffered at your hands. Hildibrand moves quickly, deftly disarming his erstwhile traveling companion. As the hulking duelist angrily chases the inspector about the Coliseum, the phantom thief takes advantage of the chaos, dropping from the rafters a single gold truffle. Its aroma tickles the sensitive nose of Typhon, the resulting sneeze sending the ring soaring through the air. Just as Hildibrand has given up hope, Godbert returns, seizing his son by the legs and hurling him heavensward─and clear through the Coliseum roof─with truly Mandervillian strength. Events take another turn when the victor's ring is revealed as a fake, and the thief produces a common key and declares his intentions to claim the <var 1A 02 /var>true<var 1A 01 /var> treasure─the Ring of Inquiry, sat safely in the storehouse as a consolation prize. Upon hearing this, Dour Meadow panics and calls for the Stone Torches to pursue, but it is for naught, as the fiend absconds with the priceless relic. As Inspector Briardien and Ellie ponder what has transpired, a massive challenge card falls from above, and another mighty sneeze─this time from Nashu─sends it toppling over the unfortunate Hildibrand. The message speaks of four sacred treasures and justice served, which Godbert recognizes as a reference to an old legend from the times of the Belah'dians. Inspector Briardien and Ellie muse that the thief holds a deep-seated grudge against the wealthy and the powerful, but other than that, it is not immediately evident where the thief intends to strike next...
target: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_SEQ_07<tab>表彰式の最中に現れた怪盗白仮面は、大会の副賞である「審理の指輪」を奪って逃げていった。次の標的は「ウルダハの秘宝」。予告状によると、それで4つの神器は揃い、正義の裁きが下されるという。怪盗白仮面の狙いとは、一体何なのだろうか。事件屋たちは、次こそ「怪盗白仮面」の犯行を止めなければならない……。

target: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_SEQ_08<tab>

source: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Dour Meadow.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_TODO_00<tab>ダワー・メドーと話す

source: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Briardien.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_TODO_01<tab>ブリアルディアンと話す

source: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Dour Meadow at Halatali.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_TODO_02<tab>ハラタリ修練所のダワー・メドーと話す

source: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_TODO_03<tab>Use the Duty Finder to confront Ultros atop the Dragon's Neck.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_TODO_03<tab>「アマジナ杯闘技会決勝戦」を攻略

source: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_TODO_04<tab>Speak with Briardien.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_TODO_04<tab>ブリアルディアンと話す

source: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_TODO_05<tab>Speak with Dour Meadow inside the Coliseum.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_TODO_05<tab>コロセウムのダワー・メドーと話す

source: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_BRIARDIEN_000_000<tab>Well, that merchant proved to be a spectacular waste of time─time which is in short supply. We must return to the Coliseum before the battles begin.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_BRIARDIEN_000_000決勝戦の開始時間になってしまったようだ。
コロセウムでダワー・メドーが待っているだろう。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_BRIARDIEN_000_001<tab>Here is the plan, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>: I shall find a suitable vantage point to observe Miss Avila in combat. Until I have ascertained the trickery behind her abilities, you are to keep a wide berth of her blade. Understood?
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_BRIARDIEN_000_001試合中は、僕がアヴィラの動きに注意をしておく。
「剣風」の仕組みがわかるまで、彼女に近づかぬよう注意しろ。
……君の勝利を祈っている。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_HILDIBRAND_000_010<tab>Do you feel the anticipation in the air, my friend!? This shall go down in Eorzean history as the greatest battle since I slew that dragon! ...That did actually happen, yes?
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_HILDIBRAND_000_010ついに決勝戦の開始ですな！
冒険者殿、がんばりましょう！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_BRIARDIEN_000_015<tab>I shall find a suitable vantage point to observe Miss Avila in combat. Until I have ascertained the trickery behind her abilities, you are to keep a wide berth of her blade. Understood?
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_BRIARDIEN_000_015試合中は、僕がアヴィラの動きに注意をしておく。
「剣風」の仕組みがわかるまで、彼女に近づかぬよう注意しろ。
……君の勝利を祈っている。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_SYNTGOHT_000_020<tab><var 1A 02 /var>Truffles à la Manderville<var 1A 01 /var>! Why, it is an epicurean revelation! I can hardly wait to recreate the recipe myself.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_SYNTGOHT_000_020こんがり焼いた「ゴールドトリュフ」……ウマそうだぜ。
調理済みのを売るのもアリだな。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_DOURMEADOW_000_040<tab><var 1A 02 /var>There<var 1A 01 /var> you are! I was this close to startin' the melee without you! Gar har har!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_DOURMEADOW_000_040よう、待ってたぜ！
もうすぐ「アマジナ杯闘技会」の決勝戦……
バトルロイヤルの開戦だ！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_DOURMEADOW_000_041<tab>Ah, I'd be remiss not to tell ye that there's been a slight change o' plans. Another contestant suffered a last-minute injury, and none other than our very own Ultros has stepped in to take his place.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_DOURMEADOW_000_041今回は、オルトロスがやけに乗り気で、
あいつまで参加すると言い出したんだ。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_DOURMEADOW_100_041<tab>With everyone's favorite octopus joining you two in the fray, spectators are just pourin' in, and bookmakers across town are rakin' in the gil─which ain't a bad thing for us.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_DOURMEADOW_100_041お前さんや事件屋、オルトロスの参加を聞きつけて、
試合の賭け金がさらに跳ね上がってな。
お陰で、主催者も喜んでるみたいだぜ！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_DOURMEADOW_000_042<tab>Word has it that Master Fyrgeiss himself is quite taken with my promotional skills. Aye, the future's lookin' bright for ol' Dour Meadow, it is!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_DOURMEADOW_000_042この試合が終わったら、俺の出世も間違いなしだ。
ガッハッハ、臨時収入もあるし、笑いが止まらねぇな。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_DOURMEADOW_000_043<tab>So, what say ye? Are ye ready to get yer arses kicked? Gar har har!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_DOURMEADOW_000_043さぁ、準備はできてるんだろうな？
さっそく入場してもらおうじゃねぇか！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_Q1_000_000<tab>Ready for battle?
target: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_Q1_000_000<tab>準備はいい？

source: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_A1_000_001<tab>Yes
target: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_A1_000_001<tab>はい

source: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_A1_000_002<tab>No
target: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_A1_000_002<tab>いいえ

source: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_DOURMEADOW_000_055<tab>Well, then you'd better <var 1A 02 /var>get<var 1A 01 /var> ready, and in a hurry! The audience is clamorin' for blood, and if it ain't <var 1A 02 /var>your<var 1A 01 /var> blood, it's gonna be mine, ye hear?
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_DOURMEADOW_000_055おうおう、さっさと済ましてくれよ！
たくさんの観客が、お前さんを待ってるんだからな！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_DOURMEADOW_000_050<tab>Aye, that's what I like to hear! Ladies and gents, it's time for blades to whirl and limbs to fly!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_DOURMEADOW_000_050よし来た！
さぁ、さっそく舞台に行こうじゃねぇか！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_DOURMEADOW_000_100<tab>Ladies and gentlemen, boys and girls, plutocrats and paupers, open your eyes and steel your stomachs! The Mythril Cup, brought to you by our ever-charitable friends at Amajina & Sons Mineral Concern─“Your concern is <var 1A 02 /var>our<var 1A 01 /var> concern!”─is about to begin!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_DOURMEADOW_000_100さぁ、皆様お待ちかね、
「アマジナ杯闘技会」の決勝バトルロイヤル！
そろそろ開始の時間だ！！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_DOURMEADOW_000_101<tab>Who will stand atop the heap of maimed bodies and twisted limbs to claim victory!? Will it be the tempestuous Avila of Ala Mhigo!? <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, the famed Warrior of Light? Or─who was that grinnin' fool again? Ah, that's right─Humberbatch, agent of infamy and imbecile extraordinaire!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_DOURMEADOW_000_101一番人気を争うのは、「剣風のアヴィラ」と「光の戦士」！
しかし、コロセウムじゃあ、何が起こるかわからねぇ！
あの「事件屋ヒルディブランド」も参加してるからなぁ！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_DOURMEADOW_000_102<tab>Or, will it be our eleventh-hour entry, Ultros, the eight-legged purple purveyor of pain!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_DOURMEADOW_000_102さらに、開戦直前になって、人気受付「オルトロス」も参戦だ！
ご自慢のタコ足で、大穴を開けるか！？

source: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_ORTHRUS_000_103<tab>Mwa ha ha! Here I am! Did ya miss me!?
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_ORTHRUS_000_103うひょひょ～！
みんな応援、してして～！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_DOURMEADOW_000_104<tab>Aye, I'd say we have a battle for the ages here, folks! Combatants, take your positions, and...let the battles begin!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_DOURMEADOW_000_104さあ、戦いの幕が切って落とされるぜ！
生き残って優勝を手にするのは、いったい誰だぁ！？

source: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_ORTHRUS_000_105<tab>(Alright, you know the deal: we team up and wipe out the others. Then, when it's just the two of us, I'll take a dive.)
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_ORTHRUS_000_105……例の場所に移動してや。
アヴィラちゃんとわいが最後に残ったら、
わいが適当に負けておくけんね。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_AVILA_000_106<tab>(...And you receive your share of the winnings. I have not forgotten our promise.)
target: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_AVILA_000_106<tab>ああ、私が優勝したら報酬は山分けだ……。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_DOURMEADOW_000_107<tab>Look at Avila's blade spin! Why, she's a veritable whirlwind o' death and destruction out there! They breed 'em tough in Ala Mhigo, that's for certain!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_DOURMEADOW_000_107すさまじいアヴィラの剣技だ！
さすがはアラミゴで育った叩き上げの剣士、強い！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_AVILA_000_108<tab>You...are next!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_AVILA_000_108優勝するのは、私だ！
さあこい、)) (( )) 02 /var>！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_ORTHRUS_000_109<tab>Here we go, ladies and gents! Once my buddy gets a whiff of these raw truffles, he'll be sneezing up a storm─literally! G'fa, ha, ha!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_ORTHRUS_000_109うひょひょ～、準備オッケ～！
先生は生の「ゴールドトリュフ」の臭いが嫌いだけんね。
この臭いでお鼻ムズムズ、鼻息を吹いてもらうのだぁ～！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_ORTHRUS_000_110<tab>Ah, nothin' like the rich aroma of roasted truffles! All this fighting is giving Uncle Ulty an appetite. Is it time for dinner yet?
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_ORTHRUS_000_110……そうそう、この香ばしいええ香りが、
わいも結構クセになっとってね…………えっ！？

source: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_ORTHRUS_000_111<tab>Wait a minute...<var 1A 02 /var>roasted<var 1A 01 /var> truffles!?
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_ORTHRUS_000_111こ、こ、ここんがり香ばしく焼かれとる～！！
ななな、なんでや～！！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_HILDIBRAND_000_112<tab>Braised in a savory sauce, just like Mother used to make them! Feel free to have seconds─there's a whole sackful where that came from.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_HILDIBRAND_000_112おや、オルちゃん殿、試合中にお腹が空きましたかな？
こんなこともあろうかと、
シントゴート殿に、焼いてもらっておきましたぞ！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_ORTHRUS_000_113<tab>That meddling muscle-head!
target: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_ORTHRUS_000_113<tab>あんの事件屋～～～～～～～！！！！！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_AVILA_000_114<tab>(What's taking him so damned long...?)
target: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_AVILA_000_114<tab>ちっ……まだか……？

source: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_BRIARDIEN_000_115<tab>The girl's gaze gives it away! Open that gate at once!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_BRIARDIEN_000_115おい、アヴィラの視線の先……門の後ろに誰かがいる！
今すぐ、その門を開けろ！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_TYPHON_000_116<tab>(-???-)Fuuuuuun...gahhh?
target: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_TYPHON_000_116<tab>(-？？？？-)……ふんが？

source: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_AUDIENCEA00204_000_118<tab>Wh-What is that monstrosity!?
target: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_AUDIENCEA00204_000_118<tab>あ、あの妖異は、いったいなんだ！？

source: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_ORTHRUS_000_119<tab>Mister T-Typhon! Is that your st-stomach I hear rumbling? C-Could I interest you in some roasted truffles, perhaps?
target: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_ORTHRUS_000_119<tab>あ～っ、テュポーン先生～！！！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_HILDIBRAND_000_120<tab>What fascinating friends you have, Ulty! Why, just look at this charming little nose! Hmmm? Is he perhaps suffering from a case of the sniffles?
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_HILDIBRAND_000_120おお、オルちゃん殿の先生ですか？
なるほど、小さなお鼻が素敵ですな！

source:
TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_TYPHON_000_121Fu...fu...fu...
FUUUNNN-GAAAHHHHHHHHH!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_TYPHON_000_121フ……フ……
フンガーーーーーーーー！！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_AUDIENCEA00204_000_122<tab>C-Could it be? Avila's vaunted Tempest Blade...it was that monster all along! The girl played us all for fools!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_AUDIENCEA00204_000_122おい、これはアヴィラの「剣風」の竜巻じゃないか！？
ってことは、これまでも、あの化け物の鼻息だったのか！
イ、インチキじゃねぇか！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_ORTHRUS_000_123<tab>D-Don't look at me! It was all <var 1A 02 /var>her<var 1A 01 /var> idea! I-I'm just a stupid octopus!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_ORTHRUS_000_123ひぃ～っ、許したって～！
わいら、アヴィラちゃんに脅されて、
こき使われてただけなんよ～！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_AVILA_000_124<tab><var 1A 02 /var>You<var 1A 01 /var> were the one who approached <var 1A 02 /var>me<var 1A 01 /var>, you double-dealing fiend!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_AVILA_000_124な、何だとオルトロス！
話を持ちかけてきたのは貴様……！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_ORTHRUS_000_125<tab>I-I just wanted to experience the thrill of battle! You know, for my work and all! Come on, Dour, has Uncle Ulty ever lied to you?
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_ORTHRUS_000_125わいらは純粋に戦いたかっただけなのに、
暴力女に弱み握られて、無理やり手伝いを……ウッウッ。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_AUDIENCEB00204_000_126<tab>What did I tell ye? I <var 1A 02 /var>knew<var 1A 01 /var> there was somethin' fishy about that Ala Mhigan whore!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_AUDIENCEB00204_000_126……俺はずっと怪しいと思ってたぜ。
アヴィラってアラミゴの出身だろう？

source: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_AUDIENCEC00204_000_127<tab>Ala Mhigans... <spit> Beggars and brutes, the lot of 'em. We give them a home in our lands, and this is the thanks we get? Send her to Garlemald for all I care─just get her out o' my sight before I get sick!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_AUDIENCEC00204_000_127そうだそうだ、アラミゴ出身の奴らって、
金のためなら何でもやるような、クズばっかだもんな。
これは、反則行為で失格だろう。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_AVILA_000_128<tab>But... But I just wanted to... M-My sister...
target: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_AVILA_000_128<tab>そ……んな……。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_ORTHRUS_000_129<tab>I feel for the girl─really, my little octopus heart goes out to her─but the rules are the rules, right? Now, if Uncle Ulty may be so bold...
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_ORTHRUS_000_129ダワーさん、お願いしますわ～！
わいらふたりの本当の力で、最終決戦をさせてちょ～。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_ORTHRUS_000_130<tab>I say we call off the melee and have a final showdown between the three remaining competitors─that would be me, my buddy Typhon, and <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> here. Whaddaya say, <var 08 E905 ((Missus)) ((Mister)) /var> Warrior of Light?
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_ORTHRUS_000_130アヴィラちゃんが失格になれば、残ってるのは、
わいと、先生と、)) (( )) 02 /var>だし……。
仕切り直してもいいと思うんだよねえ～。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_AUDIENCED00204_000_131<tab>(-Raucous Crowd-)Aye, that's what we want to see! Ul-tros! Ul-tros! UL-TROS!
target: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_AUDIENCED00204_000_131<tab>(-沸き立つ観衆-)いいぞいいぞ、もっと戦いが見たいぞー！！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_DOURMEADOW_000_132<tab>Well, this is a most unprecedented turn of events! But who am I to deny the wishes of such a passionate crowd of martial arts aficionados?
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_DOURMEADOW_000_132俺も、こんなことで大会を中止にしたくはねぇ。
そんじゃあ、本来のルールとは異なるが……
最終決戦は、チーム戦にしようじゃねぇか！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_DOURMEADOW_000_133<tab>The venue: Halatali! The fighters: the tag team of Ultros and Typhon versus the Warrior of Light! Who will be left standing when the storm has settled? Be there, or miss a battle for the ages!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_DOURMEADOW_000_133しかし、本気の鼻息を吹き荒らされたら、
ここじゃ観客まで吹き飛ばされちまうな……。
よし、最終決戦の舞台は「ハラタリ修練所」で決まりだ！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_BRIARDIEN_000_140<tab>So, to review: the truffles were to elicit a sneeze from the octopus's oversized crony, which would be positioned so as to appear it was coming from the Ala Mhigan girl's blade, allowing the two to sweep away their opponents with ease.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_BRIARDIEN_000_140あの「ゴールドトリュフ」が「剣風」の秘密だったとは……。
……だが、アヴィラのトリックを見破れたとはいえ、
状況が完全に好転したわけではない。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_BRIARDIEN_000_141<tab>No wonder I wasn't able to see it sooner─it's quite possibly the most imbecilic scheme I've encountered in my years as a consulting inspector.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_BRIARDIEN_000_141あの2体の妖異との戦闘は、完全に予測不能だ……。
……まったく、イシュガルドを離れてから、
奇妙な生物に出会ってばかりだな。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_BRIARDIEN_000_142<tab>At any rate, we have no choice but to trust in your abilities now, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Let us make for Halatali.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_BRIARDIEN_000_142……ともあれ、今は君の力に頼るほかない。
最終決戦の会場は、「ハラタリ修練所」に特設した、
「竜の首コロセウム」だそうだ、準備ができたら向かおう。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_HILDIBRAND_000_150<tab>He...did not fight...as a gentleman...!
target: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_HILDIBRAND_000_150<tab>不覚……ですぞ……。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_BRIARDIEN_000_160<tab>There is no telling what inane trickery that octopus will attempt next. Be on your guard, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_BRIARDIEN_000_160こうなったら、君の力に頼るほかない。
)) (( )) 02 /var>、勝利を掴め。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_ELLIE_000_160<tab>I suppose if anyone can defeat those fiends, it's you. Be safe, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_ELLIE_000_160<tab>がんばってね、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_DOURMEADOW_000_170<tab>Well, this tourney's turned into a right mess. With all the trouble I took preparin' consolation prizes for the melee, it looks like we won't be needin' 'em, after all.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_DOURMEADOW_000_170やれやれ、とんでもない決勝戦になっちまったな！
バトルロイヤルの予定だったから、副賞も用意していたのに、
二組で優勝を競うなら、優勝賞品ひとつで事足りそうだ。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_DOURMEADOW_100_170<tab>'Course, as long as you're bringin' in the spectators─and the profits─I could give a gnat's arse! Gar har har!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_DOURMEADOW_100_170まぁ、俺は客が試合に金を落としてくれれば、
なんでもいいんだけどな！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_DOURMEADOW_000_171<tab>Now, I know what you're thinkin'─two against one ain't fair, especially when one of the two is the size of a small house. So here's the deal: why don't ye bring along some o' your friends for the battle─let's say seven of 'em. That should even the odds, aye?
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_DOURMEADOW_000_171……さて、「アマジナ杯闘技会」決勝戦は団体戦だ。
一緒に参加する仲間を、8人集めてくれよな。
準備ができたら、さっそく決勝戦を始めようじゃねぇか！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_DOURMEADOW_000_180<tab>Now, I know what you're thinkin'─two against one ain't fair, especially when one of the two is the size of a small house. So here's the deal: you can recruit seven o' your friends for the battle. That should even the odds, aye?
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_DOURMEADOW_000_180「アマジナ杯闘技会」決勝戦は団体戦だ。
一緒に参加する仲間を、8人集めてくれよな。
準備ができたら、さっそく決勝戦を始めようじゃねぇか！

source:
TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_DOURMEADOW_000_150Combatants! The final confrontation will
be held here, atop the Dragon's Neck!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_DOURMEADOW_000_150ここ特設「竜の首コロセウム」で行われる
アマジナ杯闘技会決勝戦は 特別ルールが適応される！

source:
TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_DOURMEADOW_000_151If all members of a team fall from the platform,
they forfeit the match. Let the battle begin!
target: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_DOURMEADOW_000_151<tab>いいかぁ 舞台から全員落ちたら負けだ！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_ORTHRUS_000_152<tab>Seafood soup is <var 1A 02 /var>not<var 1A 01 /var> on the menu today, kids!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_ORTHRUS_000_152うひょひょ～
お前ら全員 突き落としたるもんね～！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_ORTHRUS_000_160<tab>Thwarted again! I feel like such a sucker...
target: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_ORTHRUS_000_160<tab>か 堪忍したって～

source: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_DOURMEADOW_000_161<tab>And <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> claims the Mythril Cup!
target: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_DOURMEADOW_000_161<tab>この大会 <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>の優勝だ！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_ELLIE_000_165<tab>You did it, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! With any luck, we've seen the last of that lecherous devilfish.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_ELLIE_000_165やるじゃない！
なかなかかっこよかったわよ！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_BRIARDIEN_000_200<tab>Good show, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Your performance has earned us front row seats at the award ceremony.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_BRIARDIEN_000_200)) (( )) 02 /var>、よくやった。
これで優勝賞品を手にすることができる。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_BRIARDIEN_000_201<tab>This should afford us the perfect vantage point to thwart the thief. Come, let us return to the Coliseum.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_BRIARDIEN_000_201表彰式には、おそらく「怪盗白仮面」が現れるだろう。
君も注意はしておいてくれ。
……さぁ、コロセウムの「ダワー・メドー」の元に向かおう。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_HILDIBRAND_000_210<tab>A most remarkable display of martial skill, my adventuring friend! Clearly you have been observing me well in our travels together!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_HILDIBRAND_000_210私が気を失っている間に、冒険者殿が優勝を！？
フッフッフ、さすがは私のファン第一号ですな！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_BRIARDIEN_000_215<tab>The ceremony will begin any moment now. Be on your guard─our adversary may be anywhere...or anyone.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_BRIARDIEN_000_215さぁ、表彰式が始まる……。
「怪盗白仮面」に注意するんだ。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_DOURMEADOW_000_300<tab>It was a battle for the ages, but a worthy victor has risen to claim the spoils! And now, let's take a look at the relic that our champion has won!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_DOURMEADOW_000_300それではお待ちかね、
優勝賞品をお持ちしましょう！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_DOURMEADOW_000_301<tab>Behold! From the personal vaults of Master Fyrgeiss himself─the Warden's Grace, a timeless treasure the likes o' which our realm has never seen! One that's earned the attention of Eorzea's most prominent pilferer! Gar har har!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_DOURMEADOW_000_301こちらが「怪盗白仮面」も狙うと噂の秘宝……
「日神の指輪」でございます！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_BRIARDIEN_000_302<tab>...Above you!
target: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_BRIARDIEN_000_302<tab>……来るぞ、注意しろ！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_AMANYFACEDPHANTOMTHIEF_000_303<tab>(-???-)Ladies and gentlemen, inspectors and invertebrates. The opening act dragged on overlong, but worry not─the main event is about to begin!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_AMANYFACEDPHANTOMTHIEF_000_303(-？？？？-)コロセウムにお集まりの紳士淑女の皆さん……
お待たせしました。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_AMANYFACEDPHANTOMTHIEF_000_304<tab>I know that you paid well for your seats here today, but I can assure you that my performance will not leave you disappointed. Now, I invite one and all to sit back and enjoy the show!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_AMANYFACEDPHANTOMTHIEF_000_304これより、私……「怪盗白仮面」による、
アマジナ杯闘技会「賞品争奪場外戦」が行われます。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_HILDIBRAND_000_305<tab>Vile fiend! Mark my words: you have stolen your last treasure─I swear it on the Manderville name!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_HILDIBRAND_000_305現れましたな「怪盗白仮面」！！
優勝賞品は、絶対に死守しますぞ！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_GILGAMESH_000_306<tab>I think not, <var 1A 02 /var>Hildegard<var 1A 01 /var>!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_GILGAMESH_000_306その勝負、待ったぁぁ！
ぶわはははは！　ギルガメッシュ様も乱入させてもらうぞ！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_HILDIBRAND_000_307<tab>G-Greg!? 'Tis always a pleasure to reunite with old friends, but your timing truly leaves something to be desired!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_HILDIBRAND_000_307ギ、ギルちゃんがなぜここに！？
間が悪すぎますぞ！！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_GILGAMESH_000_308<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! You bested me once, but not today! I shall have my revenge when I pierce your chest with my spear!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_GILGAMESH_000_308さあ、)) (( )) 02 /var>！
今度こそ、オレのこの槍で、お前を串刺しにしてやる！
いざ、勝負だ……！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_BRIARDIEN_000_309<tab>Do you not mean...your <var 1A 02 /var>skewer<var 1A 01 /var>?
target: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_BRIARDIEN_000_309<tab>……串焼きの間違いじゃないか？

source: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_GILGAMESH_000_310<tab>...My spear!
target: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_GILGAMESH_000_310<tab>なんじゃこりゃああああああ！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_GILGAMESH_100_310<tab>Vile thief! Is there not a shred of honor in you? Return my weapon at once!
target: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_GILGAMESH_100_310<tab>てめっ、ヒルちゃん、そういうのやめろよ！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_AMANYFACEDPHANTOMTHIEF_200_310<tab>Oh ho, it seems we have an unexpected guest. I appreciate your enthusiasm, but I fear attendance at today's performance is by invitation only.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_AMANYFACEDPHANTOMTHIEF_200_310おやおや、招かれざるお客様がひとり……。
残念ですが、ご退場いただきましょう。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_ORTHRUS_200_311<tab>Hm? Now it's raining truffles? But the battle's already...
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_ORTHRUS_200_311んん？　なんで「ゴールドトリュフ」が落ちてきたんや～？
とほほ～、勝負はもう終わっとるのに……。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_ORTHRUS_100_311<tab>M-Mister Typhon...? Ah, er...just a moment, I'm sure I had a tissue here somewh─
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_ORTHRUS_100_311あ、先生……！？
鼻息は、もう少し我慢してもらえると……。

source:
TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_TYPHON_100_311Fu...fu...fu...fu...
FUNNNNNN-GAAAAAAAAAHHH!!!!!!
target: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_TYPHON_100_311<tab>フ……フ……フンガーーーー！！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_HILDIBRAND_101_311<tab>Alas and alack! The ring sails straight into the hands of the fiend!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_HILDIBRAND_101_311あの高さでは……！
こ、このままでは、指輪が盗られてしまいますぞ！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_GODBERT_102_311<tab>(-???-)Giving up so soon, are we? ...Those don't sound like the words of a Manderville man.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_GODBERT_102_311(-？？？？-)ホッホッホウ！
マンダヴィル家の紳士たるもの、簡単に諦めてはなりませんぞ？

source: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_HILDIBRAND_103_311<tab>B-But of course! Brilliant, Father! If the ring won't come to me, I shall go to the ring! Why, it'll be just like Dalamud!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_HILDIBRAND_103_311な、なるほど、このまま上空に投げてもらえば……！
父上、全力で頼みますぞ！！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_GODBERT_200_311<tab>Hildibrand Helidor Maximilian Manderville...
target: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_GODBERT_200_311<tab>行くぞ、我が息子よーーーーーーーーーーーーーーッ！！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_GODBERT_104_311<tab>...Skyward, as only a Manderville can!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_GODBERT_104_311マンダヴィィィィィィィル！
夢ゥ～～幻～～闘ゥ～～舞～～ッ！！！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_HILDIBRAND_105_311<tab>F-Father! You know not your own strengaaaaaaHHHHHH...!
target: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_HILDIBRAND_105_311<tab>全力過ぎたァーーーーーーッ！！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_HOTCH_200_311<tab>Nine hundred and ninety-seven! Nine hundred and ninety-eight! Nine hundred and ninety...
TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_HILDIBRAND_300_311<tab>...aaaAAAaaahhhHHHhhh-oof!
target: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_HILDIBRAND_300_311<tab>ワァーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーッ！！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_HUTCHIN_200_312<tab>These legs! They look strangely...familiar.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_HUTCHIN_200_312<tab>……マントラ、効いてる？

source: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_GODBERT_106_311<tab>Hah! Put a little too much spin on that one, it seems.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_GODBERT_106_311オゥ……。
ちょっと力を入れすぎましたな……。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_AMANYFACEDPHANTOMTHIEF_000_312<tab>Not exactly as planned, but who can argue with the results? Save for one thing... This ring is a fake.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_AMANYFACEDPHANTOMTHIEF_000_312……おやおや、勝者にあたえられし秘宝は、
どうやらまがい物のようです。
天下のコロセウム財団も、ケチなことをなさる。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_AMANYFACEDPHANTOMTHIEF_000_313<tab>But no matter. I have a feeling this will lead me to the <var 1A 02 /var>true<var 1A 01 /var> treasure. Until next time, friends! You have been a most attentive audience.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_AMANYFACEDPHANTOMTHIEF_000_313私は、真なる秘宝をいただいて帰るとします。
……それでは、紳士淑女の皆様、またお会いいたしましょう！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_DOURMEADOW_000_314<tab>That key! B-Bloody hells!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_DOURMEADOW_000_314あれは、倉庫のカギ……？
お、おい、あそこには、まだ副賞の賞品が……！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_DOURMEADOW_100_314<tab>Guards! Seize the fiend at once!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_DOURMEADOW_100_314お、おい！　警備の鉄灯団は何をしてんだ！
早く「怪盗白仮面」を捕まえろ！！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_STONETORCH00204_000_315<tab>I-It's too late, sir! The second prize─the Ring of Inquiry─it's gone!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_STONETORCH00204_000_315や、やられました！
倉庫にあった、副賞の「審理の指輪」がありません！！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_ELLIE_000_316<tab><var 1A 02 /var>Second<var 1A 01 /var> prize? What is the meaning of this!?
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_ELLIE_000_316優勝賞品ではなくて、副賞を狙った……？
いったい、どういうことなの？

source: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_GODBERT_000_317<tab>...Many-faced fiend or no, the man spoke true. A master goldsmith's eyes cannot be deceived─this sun sphere is clearly a second-rate replica.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_GODBERT_000_317<tab>……ホウ、この指輪に装飾された太陽石は、偽物のようですな。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_DOURMEADOW_000_318<tab>P-Preposterous! It's just, ah, the dim lighting! Yes, if you'll just step over here...
target: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_DOURMEADOW_000_318<tab>い、いや、そんなばかな……えーっと。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_BRIARDIEN_000_319<tab>Have you taken ill, friend? You seem to be perspiring most heavily...
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_BRIARDIEN_000_319……どうした、異様な焦り方だ。
まさか、本物を着服でもしたのか？

source: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_DOURMEADOW_000_320<tab>L-Let's not be so hasty, friends! I can explain!
target: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_DOURMEADOW_000_320<tab>そ、それは……いや、その……。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_AVILA_000_321<tab>I sold out my honor, joined forces with that odious octopus...all for a false treasure. What a fool I have been! Whatever was I thinking?
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_AVILA_000_321何としてでも、優勝賞品を獲ろうとしていたのに、
まさか、優勝賞品が偽物だったとは……。
……私はいったい、何のためにがんばっていたのだろうな。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_HILDIBRAND_000_322<tab>Do not berate yourself so, Miss Avila! Why, it was exactly as you said, was it not? You were thinking of dear Hegelina, and nothing more!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_HILDIBRAND_000_322はっはっは、それは妹さんのためと、
ご自身で言っていたではないですか！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_AVILA_000_323<tab>...I suppose I was, at that. Hm...? How do you know my sister's name!?
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_AVILA_000_323……おい、貴様。
なぜ私の妹のことを知っているんだ。
まさか、あの時……。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_HILDIBRAND_000_324<tab>I-I assure you, young miss! Under no circumstances did I tail you to the Nanawa Mines to eavesdrop on your intimately personal dialogue with your beloved sister!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_HILDIBRAND_000_324……ハッ！
け、決して尾行して、ナナワ銀山方面には行ってま……！
…………あっ！！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_AVILA_000_325<tab>Ugh, you...<var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var>... <sigh> You have the right of it.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_AVILA_000_325<tab>恥ずかしいから、あんなところ見んなよ……。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_AVILA_000_326<tab>Blinded by the prospect of fortune and fame, I lost sight of myself and what I truly was fighting for. My honor and my sister's trust will not easily be regained, but I will not shirk from the challenge.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_AVILA_000_326そうだったな……。
私は、金のためじゃなくて、妹のために戦ってたんだ。
どん底には慣れてる、また這い上がればいいさ……。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_BRIARDIEN_000_327<tab>One mystery still remains. Before the thief had identified the ring as fake, he had already acquired the key to the storeroom.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_BRIARDIEN_000_327……ひとつ、疑問が残る。
「怪盗白仮面」が優勝賞品を偽物だと見抜いたのはいいが、
ではなぜ、「本物の優勝賞品」ではなく「副賞」を奪った？

source: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_BRIARDIEN_000_328<tab>Clearly the second prize─this Ring of Inquiry─was his target from the start. But why? There must be some pattern to the items the fiend has stolen. A pattern that betrays his true intentions...
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_BRIARDIEN_000_328はじめから副賞が狙いだったとしか思えない。
……となると、導き出される結論はただひとつ。
今までの盗品に、奴の狙いが隠されているということだ。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_GODBERT_000_329<tab>The Treaty-Blade, Azeyma's Virtue, the Ring of Inquiry...all relics with quite a history. Or, to be more precise, relics from the era of the Belah'dians.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_GODBERT_000_329「契約の剣」「太陽の首飾り」「審理の指輪」……。
今まで盗まれた品は、どれも歴史ある遺物。
……なるほど、すべてベラフディア時代の品ですな。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_HILDIBRAND_000_330<tab>Oho! If that is so, the answer is clear as day! The fiend means to found Eorzea's greatest museum of Belah'dian history, pushing up the prices and gouging honest men out of their hard-earned coin! Doubtless another one of his cards will appear on the scene to tell us just as much...
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_HILDIBRAND_000_330「怪盗白仮面」は、骨董品の収集家なのですかな？
まあ、次の予告を見たら、きっと何かわかりますぞ！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_ELLIE_000_331<tab>“I have enjoyed our little game, but all good things must come to an end. I shall claim the four sacred treasures, and justice shall be served.”
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_ELLIE_000_331『親愛なる皆様へ　これが最後の予告……
　ウルダハの秘宝をいただきに参ります。
　4つの神器が集いしとき、正義の裁きが下るでしょう。』

source: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_ELLIE_000_332<tab>...So this is the thief's final challenge to us. But what are these four treasures of which he speaks?
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_ELLIE_000_332最後の予告状……か。
4つの神器って、何かしら？

source: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_GODBERT_000_333<tab>“Where the four treasures of Belah'dia become one, the wicked shall be judged in the blazing light of sun.”
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_GODBERT_000_333『ベラフディア四大神器が集まりし時、
　日神アーゼマが正義の裁きをくだすであろう。』

source: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_GODBERT_000_334<tab>An old legend─little more than a faerie tale, at that. And yet it seems the phantom believes there is some truth in these words...
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_GODBERT_000_334これはただの古い言い伝え……おとぎ話の類。
しかし、「怪盗白仮面」は何らかの確証をもって、
秘宝を集めてきたのかもしれませんな。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_BRIARDIEN_000_335<tab>Four sacred relics from Belah'dia? The Warden's justice? Lofty words coming from a glorified footpad.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_BRIARDIEN_000_335四大神器、正義の裁き……か。
強盗ごときが、大層な目標を持ったものだ。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_ELLIE_000_336<tab>...One who's winning over the commonfolk by the day, if rumors are to be believed. It would seem the tales of a master thief ruffling the feathers of the rich and famous have won the man more than a few admirers.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_ELLIE_000_336でも、実際に一般の読者からは人気なのよね。
これまで「怪盗白仮面」が出し抜いてきたのって、
いわゆる「金持ち」と「権力」だから。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_ELLIE_000_337<tab>Consider his targets thus far: an Ul'dahn collector and her hired thugs, a trading mogul and the Brass Blades, and now a mining magnate and the Stone Torches. Is it any surprise that the sympathies of ordinary Ul'dahns would lie with the perpetrator rather than his victims?
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_ELLIE_000_337最初は、金持ち婦人と自警団。
次は、金持ち商人と銅刃団。
今回は、大手財団と鉄灯団……ほらね？

source: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_BRIARDIEN_000_338<tab>...Astutely observed, Miss Ellie. Our quarry clearly harbors no small degree of resentment for wealth and authority. Might his next target be a member of the Syndicate? Perhaps the sultana herself?
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_BRIARDIEN_000_338「怪盗白仮面」自身が、権威に恨みがある可能性が高いな。
やれやれ、「裁き」の対象は富者か、王家か……。
厄介なことになってきたな。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_HILDIBRAND_000_339<tab>Haha! Then it will be to his downfall! For the greater the challenge, the higher I rise! Ahem...just one moment, if you would.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_HILDIBRAND_000_339ふっ……怯えることはありません。
最終決戦に強いと噂の、この事件屋ヒルディブランドが、
真の推理力で「怪盗白仮面」を捕らえてみせましょう！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_HILDIBRAND_000_340<tab>Mark my words, ye of many faces! There is but one man who shall lay claim to the four lost relics of Belah'dia, and it shall be Hildibrand─agent of enquiry, inspector extraordinaire!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_HILDIBRAND_000_340「怪盗白仮面」よ！
4つの神器を集めるのは……この私ですぞ！！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_ELLIE_000_341<tab>...Yes, I'm sure that inspires us all with great confidence.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_ELLIE_000_341<tab>……お前が集めてどうする！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_GODBERT_000_342<tab>Hm, was that...? No, it couldn't be. Hah! Methinks Godbert may need a new pair of spectacles!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_GODBERT_000_342あれはまさか……？
…………いや、そんなわけありませんな。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_HILDIBRAND_000_350<tab>It's a race to recover the four lost relics of Belah'dia!
target: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_HILDIBRAND_000_350<tab>ベラフディアの四大神器に秘められた伝説

source: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_HILDIBRAND_000_351<tab>As the fiend's true identity and aspirations are revealed!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_HILDIBRAND_000_351怪盗白仮面の真の狙い……
ついに その理由が明かされる

source: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_HILDIBRAND_000_352<tab>Will Eorzea fall prey to the forces of evil?
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_HILDIBRAND_000_352果たして 事件屋ヒルディブランドは
エオルゼアを守ることができるのか？

source: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_HILDIBRAND_000_353<tab>Or will our hero do what only a Manderville can?
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_HILDIBRAND_000_353次回 感動の最終回「事件は砂塵に消ゆ」
“不可能”を除いた後に 残された“真実”とは……

source: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_354<tab>The key to the next case is a mask! Have you ever worn a mask for so long that you forgot what you actually looked like? I have!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_354今度の事件解決の鍵は「マスク」です～！
「怪盗白仮面」さんって、何枚マスクを持ってるんでしょう……？

source: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_355<tab>And how did they freeze in midair like that? Talk about a mystery! Oh, well─see you next time!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_NASHUMHAKARACCA_000_355最後の事件当日まで何が起こるかわかりませんっ！
実際の事件現場を目撃することになるのは……
アナタですよ～！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_ELLIE_000_307<tab>
target: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_ELLIE_000_307<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_HUTCHIN_200_311<tab>
target: TEXT_CHRHDB404_00204_HUTCHIN_200_311<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）
